title: Lethal Impulse - Novel Updates
author: Parting Sorrow Forgotten   忘记离愁
description:
WeChat red packets from strangers are lethal! Do not tap it on impulse!
Spooky and lethal things ensue after my classmates all tap a big WeChat red packet from a stranger in the WeChat group.
One after another, my classmates die.
Perhaps, I’m the very next…>
